import React from 'react'; import { useApp } from '../context/AppContext'; import { TrendingUp, TrendingDown, Plus, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; const PortfolioScreen: React.FC = () => { const { state } = useApp(); const user = state.user; const totalValue = user?.portfolio.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.currentValue, 0) || 0; const totalGain = user?.portfolio.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.totalGain, 0) || 0; const totalGainPercent = totalValue > 0 ? (totalGain / (totalValue - totalGain)) * 100 : 0; return (
{/* Header */}

Portfolio

{/* Portfolio Overview */}
Total Value
${totalValue.toLocaleString()}
Total Gain/Loss
= 0 ? 'positive-change' : 'negative-change'}`}> {totalGain >= 0 ? '+' : ''}${totalGain.toLocaleString()}
= 0 ? 'positive-change' : 'negative-change'}`}> {totalGainPercent >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{totalGainPercent.toFixed(2)}%
{/* Holdings */}

Holdings

{user?.portfolio && user.portfolio.length > 0 ? (
{user.portfolio.map((holding) => { const stock = state.stocks.find(s => s.symbol === holding.symbol); return (

{holding.symbol}

{stock?.name}
Shares: {holding.shares}
Avg Price: ${holding.averagePrice}
${holding.currentValue.toLocaleString()}
= 0 ? 'positive-change' : 'negative-change' }`}> {holding.totalGain >= 0 ? : } {holding.totalGain >= 0 ? '+' : ''}${holding.totalGain.toLocaleString()}
= 0 ? 'positive-change' : 'negative-change'}`}> {holding.totalGainPercent >= 0 ? '+' : ''}{holding.totalGainPercent.toFixed(2)}%
); })}
) : (
ðŸ“Š

No holdings yet

Start building your portfolio by adding stocks

)}
{/* Watchlist */}

Watchlist

{user?.watchlist && user.watchlist.length > 0 ? (
{user.watchlist.map((symbol) => { const stock = state.stocks.find(s => s.symbol === symbol); if (!stock) return null; return (

{stock.symbol}

{stock.name}

${stock.price}
0 ? 'positive-change' : stock.changePercent < 0 ? 'negative-change' : 'neutral-change' }`}> {stock.changePercent > 0 ? : } {stock.changePercent > 0 ? '+' : ''}{stock.changePercent.toFixed(2)}%
); })}
) : (
ðŸ‘€

Watchlist is empty

Add stocks to track their performance

)}
{/* Performance Charts */}

); }; export default PortfolioScreen;
